name: Where's Me Baby?!
description:
We recently took part in a 48 hour game jam, and created this game called " Wheres Me Baby ?! ". If everyone could click the link and vote for the game we'd highly appreciate it :))

http://jams.gamejolt.io/gamejamplus2019/games/WheresMeBaby/430673?fbclid=IwAR0-HiGnIYsTv_dw892Ze7QvToYKIGLk5d-zkkpY9hlCFwHuSBJ0EhrQ1Kc

In this game you will play as both a lost baby, enjoying life carelessly and joyfully going on an adventure, and the baby's incredibly stressed and freaked out mother. As the baby, go collect snacks and junk food for points, as the mother, find the clues and get yo baby back! 

To Play

WSAD (up, down, left, right)

(Mobile Version Coming Soon.)

TEAM:

Level Design & Programming - Chloe Mooney

Programming - Brian Duffy

UI and Sprites - Eoin Lenord

Asset Gathering - Tom Dunbar

Audio - João Gonçalves
